quiz.question: Word embeddings represent words as dense, numerical vectors in a high-dimensional space.
TF-IDF is a word embedding technique that learns word representations by predicting context words.
One advantage of using pre-trained word embeddings is that they can save training time and resources.
Traditional word embeddings like Word2Vec are highly effective at capturing the different meanings of polysemous words.
FastText is an extension of Word2Vec that considers subword information.
